column2: "I was sure that if it was you, you would be willing to help us.  Thank you."
"Now then, since thats taken care of we need to get to work."
"The date of the erased records.  If you go back to that time you should discover something."
"This will be very similar to all the time explorations you have been doing up to this point."
"But, you should be able to do this.  After all you have made many jumps before up to this point."
"...it's possible Xion anticipated all of this. ...that's why she chose you."
"Leave the back up to me, you should head to the location."
"You have received the Matter Board [Her birth and then...]"
